#### Service Details

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) seeks the services of an Architect/Engineer to provide design and construction administration services for additions, security improvements, and new construction of office space at Canadian international centres. This includes planning, site investigation, design, and construction administration of various projects located abroad.

#### Key Responsibilities

* Design and construction administration of modern security measures
* Site development and investigations
* Examination and proposal of design alternatives
* Consultation on logistical requirements
* Development of a Task Plan and Task Authorization
